Rules.Name: Adapt
Rules.Description: A keyword action that lets a player put +1/+1 counters on a creature if it there none on it yet.

Rules.Name: Afflict
Rules.Description: A triggered keyword ability that makes the defending player lose life for blocking.

Rules.Name: Afterlife
Rules.Description: A triggered keyword ability that creates an amount of white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying when a creature dies.

Rules.Name: Aftermath
Rules.Description: A static keyword ability that lets a player cast one half of a Split Card only from their graveyard. All cards with aftermath were removed from the game as part of the September 27 2018 open beta game update.

Rules.Name: Amass
Rules.Description: A keyword action that gives you a Zombie Army creature token or grows an Army you already have.

Rules.Name: Ascend
Rules.Description: A spell/static keyword ability causing a player to get the designation of the City’s Blessing once he or she controls ten permanents.

Rules.Name: Convoke
Rules.Description: A static keyword ability that lets you tap creatures rather than pay mana to cast a spell.

Rules.Name: Crew
Rules.Description: An activated keyword ability that lets you tap creatures to turn a Vehicle into an artifact creature.

Rules.Name: Cycling
Rules.Description: An activated keyword ability that lets a card be discarded and replaced with a new card.

Rules.Name: Deathtouch
Rules.Description: A static Evergreen keyword ability that causes damage dealt by an object to be especially effective. Any amount of damage dealt is enough to kill the receiving creature.

Rules.Name: Defender
Rules.Description: A static Evergreen keyword ability that prohibits a creature from attacking.

Rules.Name: Double Strike
Rules.Description: A static Evergreen keyword ability that lets a creature deal its combat damage twice.

Rules.Name: Embalm
Rules.Description: An activated ability keyword that lets a player exile a creature card from their graveyard to create a mummified token version of that card.

Rules.Name: Enchant
Rules.Description: A static Evergreen keyword ability that defines what an Aura spell can target and what an Aura permanent can be attached to.

Rules.Name: Equip
Rules.Description: An activated Evergreen keyword ability that lets a player attach an Equipment to a creature they control.

Rules.Name: Eternalize
Rules.Description: An activated keyword ability that lets a player exile a creature card from their graveyard to create an eternalized token version of that card.

Rules.Name: Exert
Rules.Description: A keyword action that stops a permanent from untapping during the next uptap step of the player who exerted it.

Rules.Name: Explore
Rules.Description: A keyword action that causes a player to reveal the top card of their library and then to take different actions depending on whether a land card is revealed this way.

Rules.Name: Fabricate
Rules.Description: A triggered keyword ability that lets you choose whether to create Servo tokens or put +1/+1 counters on a creature when it enters the battlefield.

Rules.Name: First Strike
Rules.Description: A static Evergreen keyword ability that lets a creature deal its combat damage before other creatures.

Rules.Name: Flash
Rules.Description: A static Evergreen keyword ability that lets a player play a card any time they could cast an instant.

Rules.Name: Flying
Rules.Description: A static Evergreen keyword ability that restricts how a creature may be blocked.

Rules.Name: Haste
Rules.Description: A static Evergreen keyword ability that lets a creature ignore the “summoning sickness” rule.

Rules.Name: Hexproof
Rules.Description: A static Evergreen keyword ability that precludes a permanent or player from being targeted by an opponent.

Rules.Name: Improvise
Rules.Description: A static keyword ability that lets you tap artifacts rather than pay mana to cast a spell.

Rules.Name: Indestructible
Rules.Description: A static Evergreen keyword ability that precludes a permanent from being destroyed.

Rules.Name: Jump-Start
Rules.Description: A static keyword ability that lets you play Instants and Sorceries from your graveyard by discarding another card, paying mana and exiling the spell.

Rules.Name: Kicker
Rules.Description: A static keyword ability that represents an optional additional cost. A spell has been kicked if its controller declared the intention to pay any or all of its kicker costs.

Rules.Name: Lifelink
Rules.Description: A static Evergreen keyword ability that causes a player to gain life.

Rules.Name: Menace
Rules.Description: A static/evasion Evergreen keyword ability that makes creatures unblockable by a single creature.

Rules.Name: Mentor
Rules.Description: A triggered keyword ability that lets a player put a +1/+1 counter on another attacking creature with less power when attacking with a creature with Mentor.

Rules.Name: Proliferate
Rules.Description: A keyword action to give an additional counter to any number of players and/or permanents of each kind they already have.

Rules.Name: Prowess
Rules.Description: A triggered Evergreen keyword ability that causes a creature to get +1/+1 whenever its controller casts a noncreature spell.

Rules.Name: Reach
Rules.Description: A static Evergreen keyword ability that allows a creature to block an attacking creature with flying.

Rules.Name: Riot
Rules.Description: A triggered keyword ability that lets a player chosse if a creature enters the battlefield with haste or a +1/+1 counter.

Rules.Name: Spectacle
Rules.Description: A static keyword ability that gives a spell an alternative mana cost and/or altered effect if an opponent lost life this turn.

Rules.Name: Surveil
Rules.Description: A keyword action that means to look at the top cards of your library, put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library.

Rules.Name: Trample
Rules.Description: A static Evergreen keyword ability that modifies how a creature assigns combat damage.

Rules.Name: Transform
Rules.Description: A triggered/activated keyword ability that allows to turn double-faced cards upside down.

Rules.Name: Vigilance
Rules.Description: A static Evergreen keyword ability that lets a creature attack without tapping.

Rules.Name: Ward
Rules.Description: A triggered Evergreen keyword ability. Whenever a permanent with ward becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays an additional cost.
